page.title: 19SOME THOUGHTS ON THE FUTURE
page.content:
{PREDICTIONS FROM JULY 1985 :}
1)Many people will die of pollution. 2)More & more nuclear missiles will be built. 3)One day the world will blow up. 4)Trees will become scarce. 5)Space for people will become scarce. 6)School classes will be run by robots. 7)Roads will become tunnels for air traffic. 8)Few of my friends will have decent jobs. 9)That England will win the World Cup. 10)The USA will win all the Gold Medals in 1992. 11)That this school will soon be pulled down. 12)That the Domesday project will never really work as well as people say it will.
